title: Morgana's Desire
description: Newlywed princess Morgana's desires begin to awaken as she and the prince try hard to produce an heir. However, as time passes and they still aren't successful, will Morgana allow a very handsome guard access to her 'virtues'? Surrounded by men and women who want her, coupled with the pressure to fulfill her duty as princess, she takes the leap and her desire, her passion begins to blossom with new, hot sexual discoveries. Â  Adding fire to Morgana's growing passions is her new handmaiden, Eva, a beautiful blonde who is falling fast for the princess. Eva is invoking a lust for women, a lust the princess never dreamed of.Princess Morgana's Desire is an erotic novella intended for adult readers, and contains literary adult scenes set in the middle ages. Themes include heterosexual and lesbian sex. This book is the first of a series. The second book in this series is "Morgana's Lovers" . The third book is "Taking Morgana"
author: Destiny H. Macintosh
